action.action-desc: Mrs. Hartzler introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to require that States give preference in allocating low-income housing credit dollar amounts to projects which are committed to providing non-smoking buildings.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Smoke Free Affordable Housing Act.

section.header: Low-income housing credit allocation preference for non-smoking buildings

subsection.text: Section 42(m)(1)(B)(ii) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by adding at the end the following new subclause:

subclause.text: projects consisting only of buildings in which smoking is not permitted, and

subsection.text: The amendment made by this section shall apply to allocations made after the date of the enactment of this Act.
